name: Boku no Natsuyasumi Portable: Mushi Mushi Hakase to Teppen-yama no Himitsu!!
name_original: Boku no Natsuyasumi Portable: Mushi Mushi Hakase to Teppen-yama no Himitsu!!
description: Boku no Natsuyasumi Portable (ぼくのなつやすみポータブル ムシムシ博士とてっぺん山の秘密!!) is a Adventure video game published by Sony released on June 29th, 2006 for the PlayStation Portable.
